page.title: 13LYNE SCHOOL
page.content: The school in Lyne is called Lyne and Longcross C.of E. First school. It is a Controlled Church of England school. It is a small school and has only two classes; red class and green class. The youngest is 5 years old and the eldest is 8 years old. In the playground there is a climbing frame with ropes. There is an adventure playground with a slide and a big field at the bottom of the field is a little pond were we put the frogs. There are no records of the early history of the school as these were all burned in a fire in l930. The school is about 90 years old.
